Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
United Financial Workers Strike Records WAG.268
0.5 Linear Feet (1 boxes)
undated
Scope and Contents
Small collection of newspaper clippings related to the United Financial Workers Strike of 1948. Several pictorial spreads from local New York City newspapers are included.
